statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_reports;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_reports WHERE eco_friendly = true;
SELECT id, appliance_name FROM energy_consumption_reports ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_reports WHERE energy_usage > 50;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_reports WHERE appliance_name LIKE '%fridge%';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_reports WHERE eco_friendly = TRUE;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_reports WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_reports WHERE appliance_name = 'Refrigerator' AND eco_friendly = FALSE ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, AVG(energy_usage) AS average_usage FROM energy_consumption_reports GROUP BY appliance_name;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_reports ORDER BY appliance_name ASC, energy_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_appliances;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumption FROM eco_friendly_appliances WHERE energy_consumption < 50;
SELECT appliance_name, eco_rating FROM eco_friendly_appliances ORDER BY eco_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumption, eco_rating FROM eco_friendly_appliances WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumption FROM eco_friendly_appliances WHERE eco_rating = 'A'
SELECT * FROM energy_reports WHERE energy_consumed > 50 ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumption, eco_rating FROM eco_friendly_appliances WHERE energy_consumption BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT eco_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM eco_friendly_appliances GROUP BY eco_rating ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT e.report_date, a.appliance_name, e.energy_consumed FROM energy_reports e JOIN eco_friendly_appliances a ON e.appliance_id = a.appliance_id WHERE a.eco_rating = 'A'
SELECT * FROM appliances
SELECT brand, appliance_type FROM appliances
SELECT * FROM appliances WHERE energy_consumption < 50
SELECT brand, energy_consumption FROM appliances
SELECT id, brand, appliance_type FROM appliances LIMIT 3
SELECT brand, appliance_type, energy_consumption FROM appliances WHERE energy_consumption > 50 ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT * FROM appliances JOIN energy_reports ON appliances.id = energy_reports.appliance_id WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;

SELECT appliances.brand, energy_reports.energy_usage FROM appliances INNER JOIN energy_reports ON appliances.id = energy_reports.appliance_id WHERE energy_reports.energy_usage < 100 ORDER BY appliances.brand, energy_reports.energy_usage;

SELECT a.brand, a.appliance_type, er.energy_usage FROM appliances a JOIN energy_reports er ON a.id = er.appliance_id WHERE a.brand LIKE 'S%' AND er.energy_usage BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY a.appliance_type, er.energy_usage DESC;

SELECT ac.category_name, COUNT(*) AS num_appliances FROM appliance_categories ac JOIN appliances a ON a.appliance_type = ac.category_name GROUP BY ac.category_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY num_appliances DESC;
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_appliances;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumption FROM eco_friendly_appliances WHERE eco_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM energy_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumption, eco_rating FROM eco_friendly_appliances WHERE energy_consumption < 100;
SELECT ac.category_name, COUNT(acm.mapping_id) AS appliance_count FROM appliance_categories ac JOIN appliance_category_mapping acm ON ac.category_id = acm.category_id GROUP BY ac.category_name;
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_appliances WHERE eco_rating > 3;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumption FROM eco_friendly_appliances ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_reports WHERE energy_usage BETWEEN 50 AND 100;

SELECT appliance_name, appliance_categories.category_name FROM eco_friendly_appliances INNER JOIN appliance_category_mapping ON eco_friendly_appliances.appliance_id = appliance_category_mapping.appliance_id INNER JOIN appliance_categories ON appliance_category_mapping.category_id = appliance_categories.category_id;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumption, energy_reports.energy_usage FROM eco_friendly_appliances LEFT JOIN energy_reports ON eco_friendly_appliances.appliance_id = energy_reports.appliance_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyReports;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumption FROM EnergyReports WHERE energy_consumption > 50;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Appliances;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_rating FROM Appliances ORDER BY energy_rating DESC;

SELECT Users.username, Appliances.appliance_name, Categories.category_name FROM Users, Appliances, Categories, ApplianceCategory WHERE Users.user_id = '123456' AND Users.user_id = ApplianceCategory.id AND ApplianceCategory.appliance_id = Appliances.appliance_id AND ApplianceCategory.category_id = Categories.category_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyReports ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT appliance_name, energy_consumption FROM EnergyReports WHERE energy_consumption > 50 ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;

SELECT a.appliance_name, c.category_name FROM Appliances a JOIN ApplianceCategory ac ON a.appliance_id = ac.appliance_id JOIN Categories c ON ac.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_name = 'Kitchen';

SELECT u.username, ar.energy_rating, er.timestamp FROM Users u JOIN EnergyReports er ON u.user_id = er.report_id JOIN Appliances a ON er.appliance_name = a.appliance_name JOIN ApplianceCategory ac ON a.appliance_id = ac.appliance_id JOIN Categories c ON ac.category_id = c.category_id JOIN Appliances ar ON c.category_id = ar.appliance_id;
SELECT AVG(energy_rating) AS avg_rating, COUNT(*) AS num_appliances FROM Appliances WHERE energy_rating IS NOT NULL;
